QuestData.Title: We Strike Now
QuestData.Description:
The time has come. The Wild Hunt has driven the Drust back to their stronghold at the edge of Ardenweald.
Their scouts report that Gorak Zhar herself is among them. This may be our only opportunity to fully purge the minions of Thros from this realm.
Lord Herne awaits your arrival at the battlefront. Go with haste, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Lord Herne outside of Darkreach.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Lord Herne outside of Darkreach.
QuestData.RewardText:
Good. You are here.
We are now ready to end the Drust's invasion once and for all.
